Title: Parugu
Writer: Bhaskar (dialogue), Bhaskar (screenplay), Bhaskar (story), Siva Koratala (storyline consultant), B.V.S. Ravi (dialogue)
Actors: Allu Arjun, Sheela Kaur, Poonam Bajwa, Prakash Raj
Plot: A group of friends are brought forcefully to a village, where they are asked to help find the daughter of the village head, who believes these friends have helped in the eloping of his daughter with her love interest.
